recipesJson.name: Chocolate Fudge
recipesJson.author: cdaniell30
recipesJson.description: This is the first recipe of my own that I've deemed worth sharing.  Was going for something different but what I ended up with reminds me of the blocks of chocolate fudge that you get at the candy shop.  If you're a fan of rich chocolates, this should be pretty damn enjoyable.  No idea how long this should steep to reach its final form, I've had it sitting for 3 days and find it delicious.
